title: In Latest Attack, Trump's Son Eric Calls Meghan Markle "Spoiled Apple"
content: Eric Trump, the son of former US President Donald Trump, has expressed his disdain for Prince Harry and Meghan Markle, suggesting his father may deport the couple, should he win the US presidential election come November.
summary: Eric Trump, the son of former US President Donald Trump, has expressed his disdain for Prince Harry and Meghan Markle, suggesting his father may deport the couple, should he win the US presidential election come November.

title: Bangladesh Army Refused To Suppress Protest, Sealing Sheikh Hasina's Fate
content: The night before long-time leader Sheikh Hasina abruptly fled Bangladesh amid deadly protests, her army chief held a meeting with his generals and decided that troops would not open fire on civilians to enforce a curfew.
summary: The night before long-time leader Sheikh Hasina abruptly fled Bangladesh amid deadly protests, her army chief held a meeting with his generals and decided that troops would not open fire on civilians to enforce a curfew.

title: Yahya Sinwar: New Hamas Leader, Also Referred As "Dead Man Walking"
content: After a career in the shadows, spent in Israeli prisons and the internal security apparatus of Hamas, Yahya Sinwar has emerged as leader of the Palestinian group in the middle of a full-blown war.
summary: After a career in the shadows, spent in Israeli prisons and the internal security apparatus of Hamas, Yahya Sinwar has emerged as leader of the Palestinian group in the middle of a full-blown war.

title: Bangladesh Hindu Homes Targeted As Mobs Run Amok After Sheikh Hasina Exit
content: Scores of Hindu temples, business establishments and temples in Bangladesh have been attacked by violent mobs after Sheikh Hasina was ousted as Prime Minister, according to a community association.
summary: Scores of Hindu temples, business establishments and temples in Bangladesh have been attacked by violent mobs after Sheikh Hasina was ousted as Prime Minister, according to a community association.

title: Who Is Asif Merchant, Pak Man Arrested For Plot To Kill Donald Trump

title: Nobel Laureate To Lead Bangladesh's Army-Backed Interim Government
content: Bangladesh's Nobel-winning microfinance pioneer Muhammad Yunus has been named the head of the military-backed interim government after the ouster of Sheikh Hasina amid massive protests.

title: Microsoft Blames Delta For Its Struggle To Recover From Global Outage
content: Microsoft blamed Delta Air Lines on Tuesday for its dayslong struggle to recover from a global cyber outage that led it to cancel more than 6,000 flights.
summary: Microsoft blamed Delta Air Lines on Tuesday for its dayslong struggle to recover from a global cyber outage that led it to cancel more than 6,000 flights.

title: 20 Leaders Of Sheikh Hasina's Party Found Dead In Bangladesh
content: Nobel Peace Prize laureate Muhammad Yunus was named chief adviser of Bangladesh's interim government on Tuesday, a day after Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina resigned and fled the country following a violent crackdown on a student-led uprising.

title: Poor Man's Banker To Leading Bangladesh: Muhammad Yunus's Journey

title: Google Antitrust Ruling May Pose $20 Billion Risk For Apple: Report

title: Israel Calls To "Swiftly Eliminate" New Hamas Chief
content: Israel's foreign minister called on Tuesday to "swiftly eliminate" Yahya Sinwar, who was appointed by Hamas as the group's new political leader replacing Ismail Haniyeh who was killed in Tehran last week.

title: "Now It Is War": Elon Musk's X Sues Advertisers Over Boycott
